00030 boost::shared_ptr<Vector3d> CoordConverter::local_to_global(const Vector3d& local_coord,
00031                                                             const Vector3d& local_origin,
00032                                          const boost::tuple<boost::shared_ptr<const Vector3d>,
00033                                                             boost::shared_ptr<const Vector3d>,
00034                                                             boost::shared_ptr<const Vector3d> >& local_coord_system) {
00035     boost::shared_ptr<Vector3d> result(new Vector3d());
00036 
00037     // compute the result vector by multiplying the coefficents (in local_coord) with the bases
00038     result->insert_element(kXCoord, local_coord(kXCoord) * (*boost::get<0>(local_coord_system))(kXCoord) +
00039                                    local_coord(kYCoord) * (*boost::get<1>(local_coord_system))(kXCoord) +
00040                                    local_coord(kZCoord) * (*boost::get<2>(local_coord_system))(kXCoord));
00041 
00042     result->insert_element(kYCoord, local_coord(kXCoord) * (*boost::get<0>(local_coord_system))(kYCoord) +
00043                                    local_coord(kYCoord) * (*boost::get<1>(local_coord_system))(kYCoord) +
00044                                    local_coord(kZCoord) * (*boost::get<2>(local_coord_system))(kYCoord));
00045 
00046     result->insert_element(kZCoord, local_coord(kXCoord) * (*boost::get<0>(local_coord_system))(kZCoord) +
00047                                    local_coord(kYCoord) * (*boost::get<1>(local_coord_system))(kZCoord) +
00048                                    local_coord(kZCoord) * (*boost::get<2>(local_coord_system))(kZCoord));
00049     // add the origin
00050     *result = *result + local_origin;
00051     return result;
00052 }
